1011100100111010 1010110101011100 1 -> sum: 0110011010010111, cout: 1
1001101010010100 0000110010110100 0 -> sum: 1010011101001000, cout: 0
0010011111010011 1001100001010001 1 -> sum: 1100000000100101, cout: 0
0110111111001011 1011100101000111 1 -> sum: 0010100100010011, cout: 1
0001111111000001 1110100011000011 1 -> sum: 0000100010000101, cout: 1
0000000011011000 1011000101101000 0 -> sum: 1011001001000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
